text: He muminagana, yakhana tomara namayera jan'ye utha, takhana sbiya mukhamandala o hastasamuha kanu'i paryanta dhauta kara, matha mucheha kara ebam padayugala gitasaha. Yadi tomara apabitra ha'o tabe sara deha pabitra kare na'o ebam yadi tomara rugna ha'o, athaba prabase thaka athaba tomadera ke'u prasaba-payakhana sere ase athaba tomara stridera sathe sahabasa kara, atahpara pani na pa'o, tabe tomara pabitra mati dbara tayam'muma kare na'o-arthat, sbiya mukha-mandala o hastadbaya mati dbara muche phela. Allaha tomaderake asubidhaya phelate cana na; kintu tomaderake pabitra rakhate cana ebam tomadera prati sbiya neyamata purna karate cana-yate tomara krtajnata prakasa kara.
